title: Phantom Dancer Glitch?
body: Is it just me or can you not walk through minions even though you own phantom dancer. Somebody try it out and let me know thanks :)

replies.body:
Phantom Dancer passive - Spectral Waltz: While within 550 units of an enemy champion you can see, +7% Movement Speed and you can move through units. 

With that said only whilst in 550 units of an enemy can you get the walk through minions. So I can't say if you could see the enemy but if you could and you were within 550 units then there might be a bug.
